                              :op1 "Europe")))
            :ARG1-of (e / eager-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :degree (s3 / so))))

comment: They do the same thing to mountain gorillas, chimpanzees and any other animal they can catch, poison or shoot. The 'traditional healer' shops are full of bits and pieces of animals that are supposed to give you 'powers'. If you want human organs, you need a contact.

      :snt2 (f / full-09
